name: Forager (itch) (Bravo)
description:
Identify the edible items using your foraging guide. Try not to poison your friend.

You must correctly identify 20 items to win. Toxic plants are marked with a skull in your pad. You have 7 seconds in which to choose. 

Controls:
Press the up arrow to skip the intro.
Press P to cycle the notepad (press O to close it quickly)
Use the left and right arrow keys to select whether or not an item is safe.

Notes:
Made in Scratch so may be a little rough around the edges. The noises that the check and cross make are set, they don't indicate whether you got it right - you'll only see your mistakes when you're done. To replay, reload the page.

Background music: geoffharvey on Pixabay
Other sound effects from both Pixabay and the Scratch library. 

Thank you for playing!
